articles.title: Ashishkumar Chauhan quits as BSE chief
articles.description: Ashishkumar Chauhan has resigned as managing director and CEO of BSE and has been relieved of his roles and responsibilities at the exchange, the bourse said. Chauhan will be joining rival National Stock Exchange (NSE) as managing director and chief executive…
